meanings.definition: The action of selling off assets or investments.
meanings.sent1: The company made divestments to improve its financial situation.
meanings.sent2: After the divestments, the business was able to focus on its core operations.
meanings.sent3: The divestments of old equipment made the warehouse feel lighter and more spacious.
meanings.sent4: She saw her divestments as shedding unnecessary weight to move forward more efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The divestments were like pruning a tree to allow for new growth.
